column2: "Ha... ha.. as expected of you, <%me>... but... I'll kill you..."
"...As your opponent, I know it well. Your strength...but... I have to kill you."
"Four people down in this sorry state... Lisa is losing her confidence. Right? Right right?"
"...I don't get it. I really don't get it!"
"Why do we have to fight these people we were laughing with just before?"
"If that's an order... that order is really strange!"
"...Yes, that's right. That command, it's weird."
"Why, didn't I... realize that?"
"Fourier?"
"I... I am... What am I doing? No, I remember the battle but that... was me?"
"...It was like there was another me inside of me... I couldn't disobey it... myself..."
"Hmmm... If I had to put it into words, it was like a lucid dream, and it feels like I've returned to reality. Yeah."
"Well, the dream as a dream was pretty fun, and Lisa is pretty satisfied, but if everyone's stopping, so will I."
"Also, if we keep at it, those guys over there seem to want to join in."
"......Darkers! Why are they here?"
"Emergency transmission to all ARKS! Darkers have taken advantage of the chaos to attack!"
"They've breached the last defensive line and are invading the Mothership! Annihilate them, along with the traitor!"
"They breached the last defensive line!?"
"That's never been breached up until now, but it was so easily...?"
"We were so obsessed with the traitor that we became careless."
"Hah, really. They're making more and more, stupider and stupider, charming mistakes. I'm going to fall in love, you know."
"Aside from that, we need to consider the remaining Darkers and siding with the traitor. ...We can't make an honest judgement, huh?"
"<%me>! Go, go ahead!"
"What's right and what's wrong, I don't... I don't know anymore."
"That's why... Just keep what you need to do and your thoughts straight!"
"That's even if the ARKS....no, [those] ARKS have to be harmed...!"
"Your choice is to protect the majority of people, I want to believe in that!"
"Go! We will stop them here! You guys keep going!"
"...I can't correct the mistake I made, but just this... let me do it."
"Did you know? Lisa hates Darkers more than people."
"Whether it's an order or whatever, Lisa only has one aim, you know?"
"That thing called Avis only goes this far, huh? No, was it some other power at work? ...Well, whatever."
"It's the words of an unwanted toy. If it lets me see some sort of eccentric activity, that's interesting in its own right."
"Now, ARKS. Darkers. Kill each other as you please. I'll allow you that freedom at least."
"Your quest progress has been saved."
